original_title: UFC Fight Night 58: Machida vs. Dollaway
overview: UFC Fight Night 58: Machida vs. Dollaway was a mixed martial arts event held at the Ginásio José Corrêa in Barueri, Brazil on December 20, 2014. The event was headlined by a middleweight bout between C. B. Dollaway and Lyoto Machida.
title: UFC Fight Night 58: Machida vs. Dollaway
